entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
